Topic.Title: Gamebook - Hyperlink to external page within sentance

Posts.EditableText:
Hello, I am making a Gamebook and would like to figure out how to include hyperlinks to external pages within a sentence, for example: 

You enter the room and a centaur is sitting at the bar.

With "centaur" as a hyper link to the Wikipedia page about centaurs.  

Can anyone let me know if this is possible? 

Thanks!

Posts.EditableText: I believe one of the page types is an external link. You can put a link within your pagetext by using the markup {command:pagename}
